description: Provision/Tear down an instance on LXD

action.description: Action to perform, tear_down or provision

platform.description: LXD image to use, eg images:ubuntu/22.04

vm.description: Provision as a virtual-machine instead of a container

remote.description: LXD remote, defaults to the LXD client configured default remote

retries.description: On provision check the instance is accepting commands, will be deleted if retries exceeded, 0 to disable

vars.description: YAML string of key/value pairs to add to the inventory vars section
